#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		string  arr1,arr2;
		cin>>arr1>>arr2;
		vector<int> res;
		int i=0,j=0;
		int l1 = arr1.size(),l2 = arr2.size();
		int temp,r=0,prev;
		while(i<l1 && j<l2)
		{	
			temp = (arr1[i]-48)+(arr2[j]-48);	 
			prev = temp;
			temp = (temp+r)%10;
			r = (prev+r)/10;
			i++;
			j++;
			res.push_back(temp);
		}
		if(r != 0 && i==l1 && j==l2)
		{
			res.push_back(r);
			r = 0;
		}
//		cout<<"The\n";
//		for(int n=0;n<res.size();n++)
//			cout<<res[n];
//		cout<<"\n";
		if(i==l1 && j!=l2)
		{
			while(j<l2)
			{
				temp = arr2[j]-48;
				prev = temp;
				temp = (temp+r)%10;
				r = (prev+r)/10;
				res.push_back(temp);
				j++;
			}
			if(r != 0)
                        	res.push_back(r);
		}
		else if(i!=l1 && j==l2)
		{ 
			while(i<l1)
                        {
                                temp = arr1[i]-48;
				prev = temp;
                                temp = (temp+r)%10;
                                r = (prev+r)/10;
                                res.push_back(temp);
                                i++;
                        }
			if(r != 0)
                                res.push_back(r);
		}
//		cout<<"\nDebugging\n";
		int length = res.size(),mark1=0,mark2=length-1;
//		for(int s=0;s<length;s++)
//			cout<<res[s];
//		cout<<"\nDebugging done\n";
		for(int k=0;k<length;k++)
		{
			if(res[k] != 0)
				break;
			else
				mark1++;
		}
		for(int k=length-1;k>=0;k--)
		{
			if(res[k] != 0)
				break;
			else
				mark2--;
		}
		for(int k=mark1;k<=mark2;k++)
			cout<<res[k];
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
